name: Celebi
description: This Pokémon wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.

attacks.name: Future Sight
attacks.effect: Look at the top 5 cards of either player’s deck and put them back on top of that player’s deck in any order.

attacks.name: Leaf Bind
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
